short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and manage job applications with statuses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Job Tracker Chrome Extension is the ultimate tool for job seekers, making it easy to manage applications across multiple job sites. Say goodbye to scattered information and repetitive tracking methods. With Job Tracker, you can save job listings, track application statuses, and get insightful stats on your job search progress—all in one place!

Features:

Save Job Listings: Bookmark and save URLs from any job site with a single click, ensuring all opportunities are in one convenient location.

Track Application Statuses: Update and monitor each application’s status (Applied, Interviewing, Offer, etc.), so you always know where you stand.

Visualize Your Progress: Get insightful stats on your applications, including number of applications, response rates, and stages reached, giving you a clear picture of your search.

Export to Excel: Easily export your job search data to Excel for more extensive analysis or record-keeping.

Simplify your job search and stay organized with Job Tracker. Never lose track of an application again!
